TopicTitle: Fly this ship to the Mun and back

Articles.Content:
Take this ship, 'The Bare Minimun II' to the Mun and back. http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=13953.0

It is possible, requiring precise and efficient piloting. Good luck!
impossible [iv\'e tried a simmilar craft and it onlygot into LKO

impossible [iv\'e tried a simmilar craft and it onlygot into LKO

Nope. Your just not a good pilot, this has gotten to the Mun many times. I never got any pictures of it, but I enjoy flying it.
Its the easiest when you start a new persistence file, dylan. The mun is positioned to be on a perfect trajectory for a rocket just leaving the KSC.

I managed to fly it to Mun orbit, hung out for a while, then returned to Kerbin orbit. Certainly didn\'t have enough fuel remaining to land safely, and since there\'s no parachute on the thing, I\'m afraid our brave crew is in for a lithobraking event. XD

Oh, and then the program crashed. I guess it couldn\'t bear to see casualties. =P
To all and any doubters and unbelievers, I have attached screenshots of a flight of mine to the Mun and back using this rocket. I used a lithobraking landing back on kerbin
